column4: why is ubuntu > kubuntu?  I am not trying to start anything.  I used kubuntu 5.10 for a while, and for various reasons I switched, and to say the least... this is a lot nicer.  It can't be just gnome?  I mean the memory useage isn't even comparable.. its odd
gnome is alright. KDE is honestly better.
well I thought it looked nicer
i dont use either though. LWM ftw :P
